column2: "Huh, that Dragonkin home base didn't seem so bad after all. Nah, I'm just kidding myself. That was all you, killer."
"Still, thanks to you, I was able to get a good look at what kinda area it is. Even just that will help me out a ton."
"I got a pretty good idea where to hide if I run into trouble, for a start..."
"H-hey, I'm just kidding! That was a joke! I promise, I ain't gonna let this info you gave me go to waste!"
